actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish a National Physical Fitness and Sports Foundation to carry out activities to support and supplement the mission of the President's Council on Physical Fitness and Sports.
short_title: National Physical Fitness and Sports Foundation Establishment Act

summary.text: National Physical Fitness and Sports Foundation Establishment Act - Establishes the National Physical Fitness and Sports Foundation as a charitable, nonprofit, non-U.S. corporation, to promote participation by private organizations in the activities of the President's Council on Physical Fitness and Sports. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: National Physical Fitness and Sports Foundation Establishment Act
A bill to establish a National Physical Fitness and Sports Foundation to carry out activities to support and supplement the mission of the President's Council on Physical Fitness and Sports.
